get.summary: Retrieves a list of all previously used tags in concepts
get.description: Retrieves a list of all previously used tags in concepts

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Return only concepts with content matching the specified query.

parameters.name: page-size
parameters.description: The number of search hits to display for each page.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of the search hits to display.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The ISO 639-1 language code describing language.

get.description: Shows all concepts. You can search it too.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Return only concepts with content matching the specified query.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Return only concepts that have one of the provided ids. To provide multiple ids, separate by comma (,).

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The ISO 639-1 language code describing language.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of the search hits to display.

parameters.name: page-size
parameters.description: The number of search hits to display for each page.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
The sorting used on results.
             The following are supported: ByRelevanceDesc,ByRelevanceAsc,ByTitleDesc,ByTitleAsc,ByLastUpdatedDesc,ByLastUpdatedAsc,ByIdDesc,ByIdAsc,ByResponsibleLastUpdatedDesc,ByResponsibleLastUpdatedAsc,ByStatusAsc,ByStatusDesc,BySubjectAsc,BySubjectDesc,ByConceptTypeAsc,ByConceptTypeDesc
             Default is by -relevance (desc) when query is set, and title (asc) when query is empty.

parameters.name: fallback
parameters.description: Fallback to existing language if language is specified.

parameters.name: search-context
parameters.description:
A unique string obtained from a search you want to keep scrolling in. To obtain one from a search, provide one of the following values: [0,initial,start,first].
When scrolling, the parameters from the initial search is used, except in the case of 'language' and 'fallback'.
This value may change between scrolls. Always use the one in the latest scroll result.
If you are not paginating very far, you can ignore this and use 'page' and 'page-size' instead.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of tags to filter the search by.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
List of statuses to filter by.
A draft only needs to have one of the available statuses to appear in result (OR).

parameters.name: users
parameters.description:
List of users to filter by.
The value to search for is the user-id from Auth0.

parameters.name: embed-resource
parameters.description: Return concepts with matching embed type.

parameters.name: embed-id
parameters.description: Return concepts with matching embed id.

parameters.name: responsible-ids
parameters.description: List of responsible ids to filter by (OR filter)

parameters.name: concept-type
parameters.description: Return only concepts of given type. Allowed values are concept,gloss

parameters.name: aggregate-paths
parameters.description: List of index-paths that should be term-aggregated and returned in result.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Return only concepts with content matching the specified query.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Return only concepts that have one of the provided ids. To provide multiple ids, separate by comma (,).

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The ISO 639-1 language code describing language.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of the search hits to display.

parameters.name: page-size
parameters.description: The number of search hits to display for each page.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
The sorting used on results.
             The following are supported: ByRelevanceDesc,ByRelevanceAsc,ByTitleDesc,ByTitleAsc,ByLastUpdatedDesc,ByLastUpdatedAsc,ByIdDesc,ByIdAsc,ByResponsibleLastUpdatedDesc,ByResponsibleLastUpdatedAsc,ByStatusAsc,ByStatusDesc,BySubjectAsc,BySubjectDesc,ByConceptTypeAsc,ByConceptTypeDesc
             Default is by -relevance (desc) when query is set, and title (asc) when query is empty.

parameters.name: fallback
parameters.description: Fallback to existing language if language is specified.

parameters.name: search-context
parameters.description:
A unique string obtained from a search you want to keep scrolling in. To obtain one from a search, provide one of the following values: [0,initial,start,first].
When scrolling, the parameters from the initial search is used, except in the case of 'language' and 'fallback'.
This value may change between scrolls. Always use the one in the latest scroll result.
If you are not paginating very far, you can ignore this and use 'page' and 'page-size' instead.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of tags to filter the search by.

parameters.name: exact-match
parameters.description: If provided, only return concept where query matches title exactly.

parameters.name: embed-resource
parameters.description: Return concepts with matching embed type.

parameters.name: embed-id
parameters.description: Return concepts with matching embed id.

parameters.name: concept-type
parameters.description: Return only concepts of given type. Allowed values are concept,gloss

parameters.name: aggregate-paths
parameters.description: List of index-paths that should be term-aggregated and returned in result.

post.description: Shows all concepts. You can search it too.

name.description: The name of the of the author

htmlContent.description: The html content of this concept

id.description: The unique id of the concept

copyright.description: Describes the copyright information for the concept

source.description: URL for the source of the concept

updated.description: When the concept was last updated

updatedBy.description: List of people that updated this concept

supportedLanguages.description: All available languages of the current concept

editorNotes.description: Describes the changes made to the concept, only visible to editors

language.description: The ISO 639-1 language code describing language used in query-params.

page.description: The page number of the search hits to display.

pageSize.description: The number of search hits to display for each page.

ids.description: Return only articles that have one of the provided ids.

fallback.description: Whether to fallback to existing language if not found in selected language.

scrollId.description: A search context retrieved from the response header of a previous search.

tags.description: A comma-separated list of tags to filter the search by.

exactMatch.description: If provided, only return concept where query matches title exactly.

embedResource.description: Embed resource type that should exist in the concepts.

embedId.description: Embed id attribute that should exist in the concepts.

conceptType.description: The type of concepts to return.

aggregatePaths.description: A list of index paths to aggregate over

totalCount.description: The total number of articles matching this query

page.description: For which page results are shown from

pageSize.description: The number of results per page

aggregations.description: The aggregated fields if specified in query

id.description: The unique id of the concept

content.description: The content of the concept in available languages

supportedLanguages.description: All available languages of the current concept

lastUpdated.description: The time when the article was last updated

updatedBy.description: List of people that edited the concept

license.description: Describes the license of the concept

copyright.description: Describes the copyright of the concept

source.description: URL for the source of the concept

conceptTypeName.description: A translated name of the concept type

ConceptTagsDTO.title: ConceptTagsDTO
ConceptTagsDTO.description: Search tags the concept is tagged with

language.description: The ISO 639-1 language code describing which concept translation these tags belongs to

title.description: The freetext title of this concept

htmlTitle.description: The freetext html title of this concept

language.description: ISO 639-1 code that represents the language used in the title

ContributorType.title: ContributorType
ContributorType.description: The description of the author. Eg. Photographer or Supplier

language.description: The ISO 639-1 language code describing language used in query-params.

page.description: The page number of the search hits to display.

pageSize.description: The number of search hits to display for each page.

ids.description: Return only articles that have one of the provided ids.

fallback.description: Whether to fallback to existing language if not found in selected language.

scrollId.description: A search context retrieved from the response header of a previous search.

tags.description: A comma-separated list of tags to filter the search by.

status.description: A comma-separated list of statuses that should appear in the search.

users.description: A comma-separated list of users to filter the search by.

embedResource.description: Embed resource type that should exist in the concepts.

embedId.description: Embed id attribute that should exist in the concepts.

responsibleIds.description: A comma-separated list of NDLA IDs to filter the search by.

conceptType.description: The type of concepts to return.

aggregatePaths.description: A list of index paths to aggregate over

origin.description: Reference to where the article is procured

validFrom.description: Date from which the copyright is valid

validTo.description: Date to which the copyright is valid

processed.description: Whether or not the content has been processed

status.description: Status of concept at saved time

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when note was saved

code.description: Code stating the type of error

wordClass.description: Word class / part of speech, ex. noun, adjective, verb, adverb, ...

examples.description: List of examples of how the gloss can be used

LicenseDTO.title: LicenseDTO
LicenseDTO.description: Describes the license of the article

url.description: Url to where the license can be found

field.description: The field the specific aggregation is matching

sumOtherDocCount.description: Number of documents with values that didn't appear in the aggregation. (Will only happen if there are more than 50 different values)

docCountErrorUpperBound.description: The result is approximate, this gives an approximation of potential errors. (Specifics here: https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/search-aggregations-bucket-terms-aggregation.html#search-aggregations-bucket-terms-aggregation-approximate-counts)

copyright.description: Describes the copyright information for the concept

visualElement.description: A visual element for the concept. May be anything from an image to a video or H5P

responsibleId.description: NDLA ID representing the editor responsible for this article

code.description: Code stating the type of error

ResponsibleDTO.title: ResponsibleDTO
ResponsibleDTO.description: Object with data representing the editor responsible for this concept

lastUpdated.description: Date of when the responsible editor was last updated

Sort.title: Sort
Sort.description: The sorting used on results. Default is by -relevance.

current.description: The current status of the concept

other.description: Previous statuses this concept has been in

totalCount.description: The total number of tags matching this query

page.description: For which page results are shown from

pageSize.description: The number of results per page

TermValueDTO.title: TermValueDTO
TermValueDTO.description: Value that appears in the search aggregation

count.description: Number of times the value appeared in result

copyright.description: Describes the copyright information for the concept

status.description: The new status of the concept

visualElement.description: A visual element for the concept. May be anything from an image to a video or H5P

responsibleId.description: NDLA ID representing the editor responsible for this article

code.description: Code stating the type of error

ValidationMessage.title: ValidationMessage
ValidationMessage.description: A message describing a validation error on a specific field

field.description: The field the error occured in

VisualElementDTO.title: VisualElementDTO
VisualElementDTO.description: A visual element for the concept

visualElement.description: Html containing the visual element. May contain any legal html element, including the embed-tag

language.description: The ISO 639-1 language code describing which article translation this visual element belongs to
